com.daw.pms.Service.PMS

Interface LoginService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LoginServiceImpl

    public interface LoginService
    Service for handle register, login and logout.
    Since:
    9/6/23
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Daw Loph

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Result bindEmail(String email)
      Bind email, send verifying code to user's email, need login first.
      Result forgotPassword()
      Forget user's password, send verifying code to user's email, only used when user have login.
      Result login(LoginFormDTO loginFormDTO, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Login to playlist master by email and password.
      Result loginByGitHub(String code, String registrationCode, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Login to playlist master by GitHub.
      Result loginByGoogle(String code, String registrationCode, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Login to playlist master by Google.
      Result logout(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Logout current pms user.
      Result register(RegisterFormDTO registerFormDTO)
      Register playlist master account using email and password.
      Result sendVerifyToken(String email, Integer type)
      Send token to yur email for verifying, no need to login first.
      Result verifyBindEmailToken(BindEmailDTO bindEmailDTO)
      Verify token for binding user's email, need to log in first.
      Result verifyResetPassToken(ResetPassDTO resetPassDTO)
      Verify token for resetting user's password, need to log in first.
      Result verifyResetPassTokenWithoutLogin(ResetPassNologinDTO resetPassNologinDTO)
      Verify token for resetting user's password, don't need to log in first.
      Result verifySignUpTokenWithoutLogin(SignUpNologinDTO signUpNologinDTO)
      Verify token for create new account, don't need to log in first.

    • Method Detail

      • login

        Result login(LoginFormDTO loginFormDTO,
             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Login to playlist master by email and password.
        Parameters:
        loginFormDTO - Login info.
        request - Http servlet request.
        Returns:
        Result whose data is user's id in pms.

      • loginByGitHub

        Result loginByGitHub(String code,
                     String registrationCode,
                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Login to playlist master by GitHub.
        Parameters:
        code - Authorization code.
        registrationCode - Registration code for new user.
        request - Http servlet request.
        Returns:
        Result whose data is user's id in pms.

        registrationCode - Registration code for new user.

        Returns:

      • register

        Result register(RegisterFormDTO registerFormDTO)
         throws javax.mail.MessagingException,
                UnsupportedEncodingException
        Register playlist master account using email and password.
        Parameters:
        registerFormDTO - Register form dto.
        Returns:
        Registered user's id in pms if success.
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException - if any.
        UnsupportedEncodingException - if any.

        Returns:
        Result for logout.

               throws javax.mail.MessagingException,

      • sendVerifyToken

        Result sendVerifyToken(String email,
                       Integer type)
                throws javax.mail.MessagingException,
                       UnsupportedEncodingException
        Send token to yur email for verifying, no need to login first.
        Parameters:
        email - Email to receive token.
        type - Token type, 1 for sign up, 2 for reset password.
        Returns:
        Common result.
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException - javax.mail.MessagingException.
        UnsupportedEncodingException - java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException.
